fieldUpdates.description: Assign Case to Renewal Case Queue
fieldUpdates.name: Assign Case to Renewal Case Queue

fieldUpdates.description: Increments the followup date change count every time the date is changed.
fieldUpdates.name: Increment Followup Date Change count

fieldUpdates.description: MF-Pending Status SLA Status To Pendi
fieldUpdates.name: MF-Pending Status SLA Status To Pendi
MF-Pending Status SLA Status to Met

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(RecordType.Name =='MF Termination' , IF( Termination_Date__c > TODAY() , DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(Termination_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(MONTH(Termination_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(DAY(Termination_Date__c)) & ' 05:00:00' ) ,NOW() ), Submission_Action_Date_Time__c )
fieldUpdates.name: MF-Update Submission DateTm-Termination

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR( RecordType.Name =='MF Member/Group Updates', RecordType.Name =='MF Audit'), NOW(), Submission_Action_Date_Time__c )
fieldUpdates.name: MF-Update Submission DateTm-Update/Audit

fieldUpdates.description: Update Submission Date time for NHE/QLE
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(OR( RecordType.Name =='MF NHE', RecordType.Name =='MF QLE'), IF( Anticipated_Effective_Date__c > TODAY() , DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(MONTH(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c)) & '-' & TEXT(DAY(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c)) & ' 05:00:00' ) ,NOW() ), Submission_Action_Date_Time__c )
fieldUpdates.name: MF-Update Submission DateTm-NHE/QLE

fieldUpdates.description: MF - Update automation date when status
fieldUpdates.name: MF - Update automation date when status

fieldUpdates.description: Set Case Subject For NHE,QLE,Termination, Updates
fieldUpdates.formula: If( NOT(ISNULL(AccountId)), Account.Name &" : " ,"" ) & If( NOT(ISNULL(ContactId)), Contact.FirstName & " " & Contact.LastName &" : " ,"" ) & If( NOT(ISNULL(Carrier__c)), Carrier__r.Name &" : " ,"" ) & TEXT(Type)
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Subject For NHE,QLE,Termination

fieldUpdates.description: Set RFI Status to RFI Violated
fieldUpdates.name: Set RFI Status to RFI Violated

fieldUpdates.description: Set Submission SLA Indicator To Orange
fieldUpdates.name: Set Submission SLA Indicator To Orange
Set Submission SLA Indicator To Red
Update Case Owner to New Plan Queue

fieldUpdates.description: We are unchecking the filter, if the filter is not unchecked within 1 hour.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Play filter

fieldUpdates.description: Update Case Record Type to Payroll Care
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Record Type to Payroll Care

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the case status to New
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Status to New

fieldUpdates.description: Update Case Type To Payroll Care
fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Type To Payroll Care
Update First Response Start Time To Toda

rules.fullName: Alert For RFI Reminder v1

criteriaItems.value: MF QLE,MF NHE,MF Termination,MF Member/Group Updates,Member Fulfillment Emails,MF Audit

rules.description: Sets requires action when RFI information is not received

rules.fullName: Engagement%3AUpdate Case Record Type to Payroll Care
rules.formula: Ischanged(OwnerId) && Owner:Queue.QueueName ="Payroll Care Routing" && NOT(Contains(RecordType.Name ,"Payroll Care") ) && $User.Data_Migration_Validation__c = false

rules.fullName: MF - Update BASIC Case From Draft to New Day After
rules.description: Update MF Basic Case Update to New
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Draft") && OR( RecordType.Name="MF QLE", RecordType.Name="MF Termination", RecordType.Name="MF Member/Group Updates", RecordType.Name="MF NHE" ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"") && IF((CONTAINS(Integration_Key__c,"BASIC")),TRUE,FALSE) && Termination_Date__c >= TODAY()

rules.fullName: MF - Update BASIC Case From Draft to New%3A Term %3D Today Past
rules.description: Update MF Basic Case Update to New
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Draft") && OR( RecordType.Name="MF QLE", RecordType.Name="MF Termination", RecordType.Name="MF Member/Group Updates", RecordType.Name="MF NHE" ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"") && IF((CONTAINS(Integration_Key__c,"BASIC")),TRUE,FALSE) && Termination_Date__c < TODAY()

rules.fullName: MF - Update automation date when status updated
rules.description: MF - Update automation date when status is updated

rules.fullName: MF-Update Submission Action Date Time

criteriaItems.value: MF QLE,MF NHE,MF Termination,MF Member/Group Updates,MF Audit

rules.description: Member Fulfillment - Update Submission Action Date Time

rules.fullName: NHE Update First Response Start Time %3C30
rules.description:
NHE Update First Response Start Time when a case is created
IF( ISChanged(OwnerId)&& Owner:User.Id !=null, True,
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Draft") && OR( RecordType.Name="MF NHE" ) && IF(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c <= TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , IF(Termination_Date__c <= TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , False ) ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: New Case Set Requires Action

criteriaItems.value: Recovery Cases,Benefits BoR - NHE,Benefits BoR - QLE,Benefits BoR - Termination

rules.description: Set requires action to true for new Cases

rules.fullName: New Plan Case - Assign
rules.formula: Owner:User.Profile.Name ='Benefits Care' && RecordType.Name='Benefits New Plan Case' && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: Notify Customer of Closed Continuation Case
rules.description: Notifies Customers that their continuation enrollment or termination case has been closed if they respond

rules.fullName: Publish Case Enrollment Information to Kafka
rules.description: Publish Case Enrollment Information to Kafka
rules.formula: NOT(ISBLANK(Enrollment_Id__c) ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Type ,"NHE") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"QLE") ) && NOT(ISNEW()) && ISCHANGED( Status ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: Renewal Case and Change Case - Assign
rules.description: Assign Renewal and Benefit change case
rules.formula: Owner:User.Profile.Name ='Benefits Care' && (RecordType.Name='Benefits Renewal Case' || RecordType.Name='Benefits Change Case') && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: Set Case Subject - NHE%2C QLE%2C Termination%2C Updates
rules.description: Set Case Subject - NHE, QLE, Termination, Member/Group Updates
rules.formula: OR( RecordType.Name ='Benefits BOR - QLE', RecordType.Name ='Benefits BoR - NHE', RecordType.Name ='Benefits BoR - Termination', RecordType.Name ='MF QLE', RecordType.Name ='MF NHE', RecordType.Name ='MF Termination', RecordType.Name ='MF Member/Group Updates', RecordType.Name ='MF Audit', AND(RecordType.Name ='Benefits BoR',OR(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Termination'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'NHE'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'QLE'))), AND(RecordType.Name ='Benefits New Plan Case',OR(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Termination'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'NHE'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'QLE'))), AND(RecordType.Name ='Benefits Renewal Case',OR(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Termination'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'NHE'),ISPICKVAL(Type,'QLE'))) ) && ( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Carrier__c ), ISCHANGED( AccountId ), ISCHANGED( ContactId ), ISCHANGED( Type ), ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) ) ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: TaxOps PTS Errors priority is Low
rules.formula: (RecordType.Name='Tax Ops'||RecordType.Name='Tax Ops - Read Only') && Owner:Queue.QueueName ='PTS Errors Queue' && $User.Data_Migration_Validation__c = false

rules.fullName: Track Followup Date Change Count
rules.formula: NOT(ISNEW()) && ISCHANGED( Follow_Up_Date__c ) && NOT (ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE(Follow_Up_Date__c) )) && OR(RecordType.Name="MF Audit" , RecordType.Name="MF Member/Group Updates",RecordType.Name="MF NHE",RecordType.Name="MF QLE",RecordType.Name="MF Termination",RecordType.Name="Member Fulfillment Emails",RecordType.Name="MF Group Updates") && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"")

rules.fullName: Update Case Play filter
rules.description: Updating the filter used in case play functionality in case user left the flow in between.

rules.fullName: Update First Response Start Time %3C30
rules.description:
Update First Response Start Time when a case is created
IF( ISChanged(OwnerId)&& Owner:User.Id !=null, True,
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Draft") && OR( RecordType.Name="MF QLE", RecordType.Name="MF Termination", RecordType.Name="MF Member/Group Updates" ) && IF(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c <= TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , IF(Termination_Date__c <= TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , False ) ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"") && IF((CONTAINS(Integration_Key__c,"BASIC")),False,True)

rules.fullName: Update First Response Start Time %3E 30
rules.description: Update First Response Start Time when a case is created
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Draft") && OR( RecordType.Name="MF NHE", RecordType.Name="MF QLE", RecordType.Name="MF Termination", RecordType.Name="MF Member/Group Updates" ) && IF(Anticipated_Effective_Date__c > TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , IF(Termination_Date__c > TODAY()+30 && ISNULL( First_Response_Start_Time__c ), True , False ) ) && ISPICKVAL(Historical_Data__c,"") && IF((CONTAINS(Integration_Key__c,"BASIC")),False,True)

rules.fullName: V2 Change case owner on Followup date elapse
rules.description: Once followup date is more than 14 days past, move case to MF Followup queue

rules.fullName: Vitals Expedite Case to Priority High
Vitals-Risk-ClosedCaseToRiskAutoClose
